home-main-content: Fast, secure and efficient, SOS Pharma is an online drug delivery service. Place an order and have it delivered within a short time.
network-error:
Network error!!.

Failed to load required resources
Please check your internet connection and refresh the page
loading-message: Setting up, Please wait a moment..
drug: Which medication do you wish to order ?
phone: Please enter a valid Cameroonian phone number, it must begin with the digits 6, 2, 3, etc
phone-enter: Please provide the number you want to pay with.
drug-quantity: What quantity of this drug you wish to order
city: Which city do you live in ?
quarter: Where do you live in this city ?
prescribtion-type: Are this medications Prescribed or Unprescribed
medications: Which other medication do you wish to order
medications-complete: Are your medications correct and complete ??
resend-billing-request: Billing request has been resend, please confirm
billing-request-followup: Have you confirmed the payment ?? or you didnt receive the billing request ?
billing-failed: Failed to send billing request, please try again <button class='btn btn-info payment-resend-button' onclick='paymentWidget()'>RESEND BILLING</button>
no-medication: No Medication identified, please provide the list of medications you wish to order as specified by your medical personnel
keywords: Please reply with the above specified keywords
input: Please reply with the above specified keywords
more-meds: Do you wish to order any other medication ?
drug-found: The requested drug isnt available, Please make sure the spelling is correct and try again
choose-drug: Please select the drug you want from the list below. If the drug you want is not in the list, click on the button below.
drug-search-complaint: The amount of drugs matching this name is alot, please if your required drug isnt found on this list, check the spelling and search again.
meds-empty: Please choose a medication before proceeding to the next stage of your purchase.
order-failed: Failed to place your order
placing-order: Your order is being placed, please wait a moment
order-sent: Your order has been placed, Thanks for using and trusting SOS Pharma, Your drugs will ne delivered to you in the next one hour.
confirm-payment: A payment request has been send to this device, please confirm the payment for your order tobe placed.
default: Invalid input, please retype your request
drugs-cleared:
Drugs cleared 
 Please retype the name of your desired drug
pay-link: Please click the payment link below to pay for your medication
waMessage: Please click on the link above to get your order invoice. Thanks for using SOS Pharma
payment-button: <button class='btn btn-success' id='payButton' onclick='paymentWidget()'> Click To Pay </button>
resend-billing: Failed to make payment for your order, Do you wish to redo your payment ?
order-again: Do you wish to order again ?
